snippet: Viviane Reding, the European Union justice commissioner, is pressing Google to halt changes to its privacy policies while the implications for personal data protection are being explored.
abstract: European governments, supported by European Union justice commissioner Viviane Reding, are pressing Google to halt changes to its privacy policies while the implications for personal data protection are being explored.
lead_paragraph: Viviane Reding, the European Union justice commissioner, is pressing Google to halt changes to its privacy policies while the implications for personal data protection are being explored.

headline.main: E.U. Presses Google to Delay Privacy Policy Changes
headline.print_headline: Google Is Asked to Delay Privacy Shift
